title: Witch stories,
author: Linton, E. Lynn
snippet: The sermon was preached in the Calder Kirk by the Eev. Mr. John Wilkie, minister of Uphall, the sorcerers being present, and was found so powerful that the devil was fairly exorcised, and the boy soon after wholly recovered. In time he went to sea, rose to the command of an East Indiaman, but perished in a storm, leaving a meritorious name singularly stained with boyish sins.
